price: Što se mene tiče, On, Allah, moj je Gospodar i ja Gospodaru svome ne pridružujem u obožavanju nikoga.
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
